page.name: The Monster and the Tower
page.description: A monster is attacking the Falconreach Guardian Tower! What brought it here? What could it want? And what is Big Daddy gonna do about it?

properties.name: The Monster and the Tower
properties.description: A monster is attacking the Falconreach Guardian Tower! What brought it here? What could it want? And what is Big Daddy gonna do about it?
properties.complete: This won't become a problem in the future, right?

page.name: Blooddrop Blade I
